item.title: 【Albums (lossy)】Dolby Atmos - Coheed & Cambria - Vaxis – Act II: A Window of the Waking Mind - Dolby Atmos [E-AC-3 JOC 768kbps 16bit/48kHz]
item.description:
Coheed & Cambria - Vaxis – Act II: A Window of the Waking Mind

Released: June 24, 2022
Genre: Progressive rock, Alternative rock, Hard rock, Electronic rock
Source: Apple Music Rip



I Found this artist/album while searching literally "best albums in dolby atmos". This is an EP with one long song - hope its alright to put in the album section. I also noticed while checking to see if i could find it on here a few people had requested it. So here it is. I am not very familiar with the band other than knowing their name an that they are reasonably popular. Going to give the atmos mix a listen to shortly!

From wikipedia

Vaxis – Act II: A Window of the Waking Mind is the tenth studio album by American progressive rock band Coheed and Cambria. The album, like most of the studio albums from the band, is a concept album that continues the Amory Wars storyline. It was released on June 24, 2022.

1. "The Embers of Fire" 1:35

13. "Window of the Waking Mind"[24]
  • I. "Time"
  • II. "The Awakening"
  • III. "Birth"
  • IV. "The Mirroring Eyes"
  • V. "The Mother"
  • VI. "The Father"
